DOC.brief_summary: The type-2 diabetes mellitus（T2DM） , metabolic syndrome , cardiovascular disease complication induce polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) insulin resistance ( IR） , become serious threat public health . In observational study , obese patient PCOS , nonobese patient PCOS , PCOS patient impair glucose tolerance（IGT） , PCOS patient type-2 diabetes mellitus（T2DM） , healthy volunteer would enrol study , Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry couple Mass Spectrometry（ LC-MS/MS）and Rapid Resolution Liquid Chromatography（RRLC） Quadrupole Linear Trap（QTRAP）Mass Spectrometry couple Mass Spectrometry （MS/MS）analysis serum sample collect PCOS patient healthy volunteer screen biomarker diagnosis PCOS insulin resistance , explore correlation traditional chinese medicine （TCM） syndrome（phlegm , kidney yin deficiency , kidney yang deficiency , qi stagnation blood stasis，dampness-heat liver channel）and metabolites PCOS .
DOC.brief_title: A Metabolomic Study Polycystic Ovary Syndrome With Insulin Resistance Its Relationship With TCM Syndrome Types
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . The selection research subject : All subject collect Fujian Maternity Child Health Hospital . 2 . The participant divide five groups：obese PCOS，nonobese PCOS，PCOS IGT，PCOS T2DM，healthy volunteers.the syndrome type PCOS divide five type : phlegm , kidney yin deficiency , kidney yang deficiency , liver qi stagnation blood stasis syndrome , dampness-heat liver channel . 3 . Ethical requirement subject ' inform consent Before clinical trial begin , program need approve ethic committee approve sign approval.The subject need fully aware clinical trial give sufficient time consider whether willing participate trial , sign inform consent form . 4 . Indicator test ( cost health volunteer pay research ) ( 1 ) Physical examination : blood pressure , height , body weight , waist circumference , hip circumference，body mass index ( BMI ) , waist-hip ratio（WHR） . ( 2 ) Endocrine hormone : collect serum subjects，use enzyme link immunosorbent assay ( ELISA ) method detect level serum follicle-stimulating hormone（FSH） , luteinizing hormone（LH） , prolactin（PRL） , estradiol（E2） , testosterone（T） . Blood lipid : glycerin three vinegar ( TG ) , cholesterol ( CHOL ) detect enzymatic method , low density lipoprotein ( LDL-C ) , high density lipoprotein ( HDL-C ) detect turbidity method . Glucose tolerance insulin release test glucose loading : subject fast 8 10 h , check fast blood glucose ( FBG ) fast insulin （FINS）.The oral glucose tolerance test（OGTT）and insulin release test perform next morning . 5.Study characteristic metabolism （1）Through sample pretreatment method , analyze optimization condition mass spectrometry , accord requirement metabolism establish blood sample LC-MS/MS metabolism analysis method.（2）Carry analysis metabolism data collection.（3）Model building data analysis（4）Use RRLC QTRAP type MS/MS positive negative ion detection mode combination hyphenate technique , combine method data statistic , establish multiple reaction monitoring（MRM） detection , verify precision sensitivity method . 6.Statistical method : All data use statistical product service solutions18.0（SPSS18.0）software package statistical analysis . According character clinical trial data ( measurement , classification grade data ) , select appropriate statistical analysis method.receiver operate characteristic curve（ROC） analysis potential metabolite select target metabolic biomarker .
DOC.criteria: 1 . The diagnosis polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) accord Rotterdam consensus criterion recommend European Society Human Reproduction Embryology American Society Reproductive Medicine 2003（2 3 ) ：Oligoand/or anovulation；Clinical and/or biochemical sign hyperandrogenism；Polycystic ovary . 2 . Diagnostic criterion insulin resistance : use HOMA model evaluate insulin resistance . The HOMA index insulin resistance ( HOMAIR ) = ( fast blood glucose ( mmol/L ) × fast insulin ( mIU/L ) /22.5 . 3. voluntary subject 1. exclusion cause Kaohsiung hormone , congenital adrenal hyperplasia , Cushing syndrome , androgen secreting tumor , disease cause ovulation disorder , hyperprolactinemia , premature ovarian failure , pituitary hypothalamus close etc； 2. exclusion organic disease endocrine diseases； 3. liver kidney , cerebral blood vessel , cardiovascular hematopoietic disorder , primary disease , mental patients； 4. patient treated steroid nearly three month , birth control pill , corticosteroid .
